fields.description:
h5.Description

When the selected SDK does not match the tiapp set SDK the {{--colors}} flag does not get carried across to the forked SDK.

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Make sure your selected sdk is different to your tiapp sdk
2. Build with {{appc run -p ios --colors}}

h5.Actual

In the forked command {{--colors}} is not present

h5.Expected

{{--colors}} should be copied over as it should exist in the command context
fields.summary: CLI: --colors flag not copied across when forking SDK
